I like to express my style through my fashion.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Hello! Not much, just hanging out. I'm trying to decide what to do with the day.
I might go for a walk on the beach near my house. It's a beautiful day out.
That sounds like fun! I love to walk on the beach. I have a dog, but I don't take him on the beach much because he chases all the seagulls.
That must be fun! I don't have a dog, but I love dogs.
I love dogs too! They're the best!
What do you do for fun?
I like to work with flowers. I'm a florist. I love making people happy with flowers.
That's a great job! I love flowers too! I like to express my style through my fashion.
That's cool! I'm not very good at fashion. I'm more of a tomboy.
Thanks! I like software developers too. I think it's a really cool job.
Thanks! I'm still in school, but I'm excited to start my career.
I'm sure you'll do great! You seem like a smart person.
